item.title: Docker image for locally testing Oracle
item.description: Docker for Oracle This post describes my journey to building and using a docker image for Oracle. It all started as usual searching the web for hints and many results led to the Oracle docker Github repository. This repository under OracleDatabase provides (almost) all the informations needed. My target machine: MacBook Pro (13-inch, Mid 2009), OS X Yosemite 10.10.5. Which Oracle RDBMS? I decided to use Oracle XE 11.2.0.2 because my use case just needed an Oracle DB, so no need to go for bigger and fancier versions.
